alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 11:00PM PST until December 26 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...Corrected typo in first section... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 10 to 15 inches, mainly near the crest. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Washington Cascades. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. This can impact travel along Interstate 90 and through Snoqualmie Pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Washington Cascades
